WorkItem.Description:
I have been wondering this for a while, but has anyone thought about having the ability to import pet info from the Armory. The XML file specifically states what type pet it is, whether it's a Tenacity, Cunning, or Furocity pet, and the key value. As an example, I'm going to post the XML tags from a guildy's pet
 
<pet catId="23" family="Wolf" familyId="1" icon="ability_hunter_pet_wolf" lvl="80" name="Wolfimus" npcId="30455" npcName="Frostworg">
        <talentGroup active="1" group="1" icon="ability_druid_swipe" key="Ferocity" order="0" prim="Ferocity">
          <talentSpec treeOne="16" treeThree="0" treeTwo="0" value="201000230300013000100"/>
        </talentGroup>
      </pet>
 
I understand that hunters can have up to 5 pets, so adding a drop down somewhere on selecting a pet to use could be useful.
WorkItem.Summary: [Hunter] Suggestion: Ability to import pet info

Comments.Message: Did that data only show the current pet or did it list all the pets?

all of the pets unfortunately.

http://www.wowarmory.com/character-talents.xml?r=Crushridge&cn=Incizion&gn=Ewiges+Licht

if you want to take a look for yourself.
No, that's a good thing. If I can get the data for all pets I could make a drop-down that lets you add/remove pets but gets prepopulated by the initial data from the Armory.
Update, with 2.3.7 I've added the ability to save/recall pet talent specs like you would for normal player specs. This is a step in the direction of supporting this ticket.
